annotations.summary: Patient reports extreme fatigue for 2-3 months with unintentional weight gain.
15-pound weight gain over three months with no lifestyle changes.
Sleeping 8-9 hours but still exhausted with persistent daytime sleepiness.
Dry flaky skin, hair thinning, and cold intolerance.
Cognitive fog, difficulty concentrating, and depressed mood with anhedonia.
Morning facial puffiness and tight rings indicating fluid retention.
Heavier and more irregular menstrual periods.
Family history of hypothyroidism in mother and sister.
New onset constipation, decreased from daily to every three days.
